title: Put this 2 bed townhome on your to-see list! You'll be glad you did!
neighborhood: 20 Minute Drive to Ferns of the World Garden
posting_body: ['Maplewood Pointe Apartment Homes', '221 Upper Riverdale Rd SW Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Pricing:', 'Please call *', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bathrooms:', '2', 'Square Footage:', '1200 sq ft', 'show contact info', 'Features in this apartment home:', '● Cable Ready', '● Dishwasher', '● Electric Range', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Kitchen', '● Tub/Shower', '● Wall to Wall Carpeting and Vinyl Wood Flooring', '● Wi-Fi', '● Window Coverings', '● Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '● Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '● Formal Dining Room', '● Frost-Free Refrigerator', '● Huge Floor Plans Up to 1500 Sq.', 'Ft.', '● In Unit Washer & Dryer', '● Linen Closets', '● Private Patios and Balconies', '● Spacious Storage with Walk-In Closets', '● Total Electric - 2 Bedroom Garden Apartments and 3 Bedroom Townhomes', 'About the community:', 'For rent in Jonesboro, GA Maplewood Pointe Apartments leases quality affordable 2- and 3-bedroom homes.', 'These metro Atlanta apartment rentals are conveniently nestled in Clayton County near Southern Regional Medical Center and minutes from Southlake Mall, shopping, dining, schools and from Hartsfield Jackson Airport!', 'Amenities at our property:', '● Business Center', '● Clubhouse', '● Complimentary Wi-Fi At The Business Center and Pool', '● Maintenance on site', '● On-Site Management', '● Playground', '● Sparkling Swimming Pool', '● 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '● Convenient Online Rental Payments', '● Convenient to Southlake Mall and Shopping', '● Direct Access to Atlanta Airport and Interstate Highways', '● Heart Healthy Fitness Center', '● Minutes to State Farmers Market', '● Monthly Pest Control', '● Private Patios and Balconies', '● Resident Referral Program', '● Walk to Southern Regional Hospital and Medical Facilities', 'Additional information:', 'Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Pets:', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $10.00 Comments:', 'A Pet Agreement is required for all resident pet owners.', 'Allowable pets are dogs, cats, birds and fish.', 'Breed restrictions apply and must be approved by management.', 'Restricted breeds are as follows: Pitbulls/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman, German Shepherd, Chow, Reptiles, and Pot Bellied Pigs', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Professionally managed by Peak Living', '*Prices are subject to change without notice', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '748AEEA050524A7A']
